name: 客１
text:
……えっと
味噌ひとつと餃子……大の方で
trans:
...Umm,
1 miso and a plate of gyoza... large please.

name: 客２
trans: Um, can I get some water?

name: 小糸
text: スープ、あんまり飲んだら……
trans: If you drink your soup that quickly...

name: 小糸
trans:
...!
Y-You're drinking a lot of it, aren't you...!

name: 透
text:
え？　うん
飲んでなくて
trans:
Eh? Yeah.
I haven't drank any after all.

name: 雛菜
text:
あ～
透先輩、コーンすくえないの～？
trans:
Ah～
You can't scoop the corn, Toru-senpai～?

name: 小糸
text:
────あ……そしたら円香ちゃんみたいに
お箸使うといいんじゃないかな……！
trans:
────Ah... Then, how about you use
your chopsticks like Madoka-chan does...!

name: 透
text:
食べれてないじゃん、でも
１個ずつしか
trans:
That isn't eating at all.
Picking them out one by one.

name: 円香
trans: I'm fine with picking them out one by one.

name: 雛菜
text:
透先輩、
コーンいっきにいっぱい食べたいの～？
trans:
You wanna eat them all in one go, 
Toru-senpai～?

name: 透
text:
うん
いちもうだじん

name: 代理店営業
text:
ハハハッ
週末のお客様、一網打尽っすね～！！
trans:
Hahaha.
All the weekend shoppers in one fell swoop. 
Ichimoudajin～!!

name: 円香
text:
……鍵置いて、
帰っていいんじゃない
trans: ...Can't we just leave the keys here and go?

name: 雛菜
trans: Then Hinana will give you hers～!

name: 小糸
text:
……
雛菜ちゃん、綺麗にコーンだけすくえるんだね……！
trans:
...
Hinana-chan, you can scoop the corn that well, huh...!

name: 透
text:
んー、やばい……
いちもうだじん

name: 代理店営業
text:
一番注目してるターゲットが中高生なんすね、今年
もう本命チョコとかそういう時代じゃないんですよねぇ！！
trans:
Our target market will be middle schoolers, 
and I'm telling you, it's not about whether it's 
obligatory or not anymore!!

name: 代理店営業
text:
友チョコ需要に合わせた在庫の拡充、これ
マジにこだわりぬいた商材入れたんすね！！！
trans:
We've even expanded our warehouse to meet the 
demand for friendship chocolates, and I assure you 
that our products are made with love!!!

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～
チョコだって～

name: 円香
trans:
Well, it's got nothing to do with us anyway...
...Let's go────

name: 雛菜
text: でも、スープもおいしいよ～！

name: 透
text:
まじすか
あざーす────

name: 雛菜
text: あ、追加のトッピングもあるよ～
trans: Ah, they offer additional toppings too～

name: 小糸
text:
と、透ちゃん……
結局スープも、全部飲んじゃったね……！
trans:
T-Toru-chan...
You drank all the soup too...!

name: 透
text:
ふふっ
いちもうだじんだから

name: 代理店営業
text: じゃノクチルさんよろしくお願いしますね！！！！
trans: Then, I'll be counting on noctchill alright!!!!

name: 円香
text:
うわ……
とりあえず逃げよう
trans:
Ugh...
For starters, let's get out of here.

name: 小糸
text: で、でも、もしかして話聞いた方が────
trans: B-But, it'd be better to get the details────

name: 円香
trans: ...What's up with you, by the way?

name: 円香
text: 『いちもうだじん』『いちもうだじん』って

name: 小糸
text: い、一網打尽がブームなのかな……

name: 透
text: 一度に、一味を全部、捕らえること
trans:
To cast once and catch everything, 
all in one fell swoop.

name: 円香
trans: ...Its meaning? Why don't you just search it up?

name: 透
text:
え、いちもおだじん？
いちもうだじん？

name: 透
text:
楽しみ、わりと
あの仕事
trans:
I'm looking forward to it quite a bit.
That job.

name: 小糸
text:
……さ、さっきのやつだったら
まだどんなのか、わからないんじゃないかな……？
trans:
...I-If you mean the one from just now,
we don't really know what it's about yet, don't we...?

name: 透
text:
え、つかみ取りでしょ
チョコの
trans:
Eh, we're supposed to grab them right?
Chocolates.

name: 円香＆小糸＆雛菜
text: お客さんをつかみ取るってことだと思うよ……！
trans: I think they meant grabbing customers...!
